title: Gold 5 ranked team LFM
body:
I am looking for players who are keen to improve and grow as a team. In terms of league silver + is fine! I am willing to train up boys and guide them to success. I have lead this team to gold 1 and since members have left I am looking for dedicated players! I am an experienced leader and find that players who put the time to learn are better than high elo solo que players

Add me and have a chat with me but please comment below the following details

IGN:
AGE:
Area ( Sydney, Melb etc):
Position:
Reason why you want to join:
Do you communicate on skype?
Do you have a skype ?
Strengths?
weaknesses?
Availability?

replies.body:
IGN: Vbulldogz
AGE:23
Area ( Sydney, Melb etc): NZ
Position Mid/jungle
Reason why you want to join: Looking for more experience to futher my skills 
Do you communicate on skype? yes
Do you have a skype ? yes
Strengths? team fights 
weaknesses? limited champ pool 
Availability? anytime ( situational consult times first ?)

IGN:Colour Shade
AGE:17
Area ( Sydney, Melb etc):melb
Position:top mid
Reason why you want to join: I have played a lot of solo que and know where my weaknesses and strengths are. And I feel like I'm ready to step my came up
Do you communicate on skype?yes
Do you have a skype ?yes
Strengths? Team fights and positioning
weaknesses? Landing phase can be a bit shabby on my less played champs
Availability? Most days after 3:30

IGN: N/A
AGE: 22
Area: Sydney
Position: Any position (can main all no issue)
Reason why you want to join: I have been playing League of Legends for years and played solo que for about the same amount of time however i have never been able to find a team that i could take my game to the next level with. I am serious about LoL when it comes to ranked and as all players do, i like to win however i believe a good team comp is the key to winning. 
Do you communicate on skype? Yes, i can use Mumble aswell 
Do you have a skype ? Yes
Strengths? Strengths include laning phase and organising ganks. I have good map awareness and often make pings even for other players if a champion has gone MIA. I can play any role well and have carried with any role (that is the key to getting to gold). 
weaknesses? Playing more than 3 games in a row. After the 3rd game depending how the previous games have gone and their length, i could become a tad tired and may require a small break 
Availability? 5pm Sydney Time  - 11pm Weekdays. Weekends i am available just give me a time and i will be online and ready

IGN: ElephantOfHunger
AGE: 17
Area: London
Position: ADC
Reason why you want to join: I love the idea of playing with people that I can talk to and work though a elo as a team to climb 
Do you communicate on Skype: Yes I can do teamspeak as well
Do you have Skype: Yes 
Strengths: Laning phase, farming, positive player (pretty patient, I think), Can play safe if I get behind, good map awareness (learned form spamming jinx ults in rank)
Weaknesses: Sometimes my positioning can be off and I get caught, might have trouble playing more than 4 games in a row 
Availability: Past 6pm (UK time) on weekdays + most of the day on weekend

IGN: R3demption
AGE: 23
Area ( Sydney, Melb etc): Perth
Position: Support / ADC
Reason why you want to join: Looking to get out of soloqueue ranked and normals so sick of playing with people not on the same level
Do you communicate on skype? y
Do you have a skype ? y
Strengths? Decision making, Aggresive support, Good at prediction, Landing skillshots, all the rest
weaknesses? Worked up when people make same mistakes and dont learn
Availability? GMT+8 5-10pm weekdays, all day weekends

IGN: Smited
AGE: 16
Area: North QLD
Position: Jungle
Reason why you want to join: I would like to join to improve as a player and learn how to work as a team.
Do you communicate on skype? Yes
Do you have a skype ? Yes
Strengths? Objective control, map awareness and ganking. 
weaknesses? Peeling, working as a team and sometimes positioning. 
Availability? Anytime after 4pm (after school) usually.

IGN: DiddlyDonger
AGE: 17
Area: Gold Coast
Position: Support
Rank: G5
Reason why you want to join: Wantint to join a ranked team and improve my gameplay. 
Do you communicate on skype? Yes.
Do you have a skype ? Yes, add me in game and message me for it. 
Strengths? Aggressive in lane, good vision control/objective control, can roam, good map awareness
Weaknesses? I can lag sometimes however I always check my ping before a game
Availability? Past 3pm brisbane time on weekdays. (aka after school hours)

IGN: DumpShark
AGE: 18
Area ( Sydney, Melb etc): New Zealand
Position: ADC
Reason why you want to join: Would like a serious team to play ranked with and meet other players with a similar mindset.
Do you communicate on skype? Yes
Do you have a skype ? Yes feel free to add me my skype name is the same as my league name 
Strengths? Very proficient at farming and the lane phase in general, good target acquisition in team fights
weaknesses? Sometimes I lack a bit of map awareness and also dont have the best positioning some time, so i tend to play mobile ADC's to counteract this
Availability? Just about all the time, I am a uni student so whenever I'm not studying or have lectures

IGN: Banssi
AGE: 22
Area : Melbourne
Position: Support
Reason why you want to join: To learn from others and improve as a team.
Do you communicate on skype? Yes
Do you have a skype ? Yes
Strengths? vision/objective control, Team Fights, advice is always welcome
weaknesses? Over-aggresive
Availability?  Most nights
